typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as short,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> casesAndDeaths
FilterByEuropeOnly select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		date,
		rate_14_day,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredFields
casesAndDeaths filter(continent=="Europe" && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterByEuropeOnly
